name: Micro Retro: Fruit Machine
description:
If the game does not load, use the regular (non-incognito) version of your browser.

Pull the lever on the right side with the mouse to spin the wheels. If the middle left symbol is matching the one on the middle center, your score increases. If all three symbols on the middle line are the same, you get an even higher score! You can reset the game anytime with the Start button on the bottom of the screen. Exit by pressing Esc.

This project is a demonstration of the game design of a mechanic gambling machine. The game requires no real money to play and does not provide any winnings outside of the score displayed on the screen.

US users can find help for gambling addiction here: https://www.addictioncenter.com/rehabs/

EU users: https://www.health-tourism.com/gambling-addiction-treatment-centers/europe-3/

EU users (2): https://www.mypremiumeurope.com/top-private-hospitals/addiction.htm
